282084C6.Line7.8C8DB: He spends his days in a fog by the banks of the Argentek River. Itâ€™s no place for kind souls. Be careful.

5A431858.Line1.8C8F8: Wait... what about the old man?

6340F7EF.VoiceDir3.8C8DB: Your assistant just suggested relying on the most unreliable, shady man in existence.

8E2C0B44.Line5.8C8DB: ...but he might be the only one crazy enough to agree.

C94C7E85.VoiceDir1.8C8F8: A sudden thought hits you out of the blue, but you're not sure it's a good idea...

F43791C2.Line3.8C8DB: Ha! I'd sooner walk backwards into the Burning Hells than rely on him!
